summary: Implemented profile-fetch hard timeout and added startup-stage diagnostics/error UI, plus updated App startup stage tracking and a 30s watchdog to avoid indefinite loading. Also includes unrelated changes to Membership checkout flow and URL/session parameter utilities not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to MembershipPage checkout flow (pricing selection, redirect handling, toggle for annual billing, Stripe session handling)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is focused on fixing infinite 'Loading your profile' startup state and explicitly lists redesigning unrelated pages (including membership) as a non-goal; these changes appear unrelated to the profile-loading hang.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded URL parameter + sessionStorage utilities (route path parsing, persisted URL parameters, storing/removing session parameters) including comments about maintaining sensitive state
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ-1..REQ-4; BuildRequest scope is startup/profile loading behavior. This looks like additional infrastructure beyond what was requested.
